body: Calendar       Please use the calendar below to search from upcoming events.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Salem Maritime National Historic Site Free Public Tours of the Yacht America      Location: Central Wharf at Salem Maritime National Historic Site Fees: Tickets: $85 (Adults); $42.50 (Children 17 and under)     Sunday, August 14, 2016 A replica of the famous racing Schooner America will be in port on August 13 and 14.
